text: Glória Menezes, artistic name of Nicelde Soares Magalhães (born October 19, 1934) is a Brazilian actress. She was born in Pelotas, Rio Grande do Sul. Menezes was best known for her role as Amelia in the telenovela Páginas da Vida. From 1962 until his death in 2021, she was married to actor Tarcísio Meira. They have one child. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:Brazilian television actors Category:People from Rio Grande do Sul
title: Glória Menezes
